title: KKND: Krush Kill 'N Destroy for DOS
material_description: CD-ROM videogame. CD-ROM, CD jewel case with insert and manual in cardboard box
brief_description: In the far future of KKND: Krush Kill ‘N Destroy, a nuclear war has destroyed the Earth’s surface. The humans that were left split into two factions: The Survivors are the descendants of humans who managed to burrow under the Earth’s crust before the surface’s annihilation, taking with them what they could salvage. They survived underground for sixty years but dwindling resources has forced them to resurface. They were met by the Mutes, humans who lived through the nuclear destruction, mutated and dominated the Earth. An armed conflict between the two groups is inevitable. The game has you choosing either of these factions. As a classic real-time strategy, the focus on this game is gathering oil, building up and upgrading your base, training units and completing your objectives. Objectives can range from simply destroying an enemy presence to gathering a set amount of materials while fending off enemy attacks.
